meanings.sent1: The book's most important information is found in the midsections.
meanings.sent2: She placed the bookmark in the midsections of the novel.
meanings.sent3: The midsections of the cake were filled with delicious cream.
meanings.sent4: His speech focused on the midsections of the argument.
meanings.sent5: The midsections of the bridge were painted a bright red color.

meanings.definition: The area of the body between the chest and the hips.
meanings.sent1: She felt a sharp pain in her midsections after the workout.
meanings.sent2: He wrapped a belt around his midsections to support his back.
meanings.sent3: The cat curled up in the warm midsections of the blanket.
meanings.sent4: The dancer moved gracefully, emphasizing her midsections.
meanings.sent5: The doctor examined her midsections to check for any injuries.
